text: Hey <@U02688JHZ>, when you get the chance would you ask the Google team if they would like us to render those widget videos in any different codec than the Animation codec we used in the current batch of clips? Or if they would like a PNG sequence instead (which I know for sure will render correct color). If they're ok with the color not being as bright as it should be, then that's fine, but I'd like to offer a different format that works better for them if they're willing to take it.
that video was glitching and i thought my computer was broken
